pullrequest.title: Add basic support for gnu precompiled headers

content.raw:
Is it supposed to work? I can't finish the build of Gazebo 8 in Release mode:

```
[gazebo:make] Building CXX object gazebo/math/CMakeFiles/gazebo_math.dir/Angle.cc.o                                                                                                                                                     
[gazebo:make] cd /home/peci1/tradr-git/drivers/gazebo7-ws/build/gazebo/gazebo/math && /usr/bin/c++   -DBUILDING_DLL -DBUILDING_DLL_GZ_MATH -DHAVE_OPENGL -DLIBBULLET_VERSION=2.82 -Dgazebo_math_EXPORTS -std=c++11  -Wall -Wextra -Wno-long-long -Wno-unused-value -Wfloat-equal -Wshadow -Wswitch-default -Wmissing-include-dirs -pedantic -fvisibility=hidden -fvisibility-inlines-hidden -std=c++11  -s -O3 -DNDEBUG -mssse3 -msse3 -mfpmath=sse -msse -msse2  -fPIC -I/home/peci1/tradr-git/drivers/gazebo7-ws/src/gazebo/test/gtest/include -I/home/peci1/tradr-git/drivers/gazebo7-ws/src/gazebo -I/home/peci1/tradr-git/drivers/gazebo7-ws/build/gazebo -isystem /home/peci1/tradr-git/drivers/gazebo7-ws/binary/include -I/usr/include/libusb-1.0 -isystem /home/peci1/tradr-git/drivers/gazebo7-ws/devel/include/ignition/msgs0 -isystem /home/peci1/tradr-git/drivers/gazebo7-ws/devel/include/ignition/math3 -I/home/peci1/tradr-git/drivers/gazebo7-ws/devel/include/ignition/transport3 -I/usr/include/uuid -isystem /usr/include/OGRE/RTShaderSystem -isystem /usr/include/OGRE -isystem /usr/include/OGRE/Terrain -isystem /usr/include/OGRE/Paging -isystem /home/peci1/tradr-git/drivers/gazebo7-ws/devel/include/sdformat-5.1    -fPIC -Winvalid-pch -include math_pch.hh.out -std=c++11 -o CMakeFiles/gazebo_math.dir/Angle.cc.o -c /home/peci1/tradr-git/drivers/gazebo7-ws/src/gazebo/gazebo/math/Angle.cc
[gazebo:make] make[2]: Leaving directory `/home/peci1/tradr-git/drivers/gazebo7-ws/build/gazebo'                                                                                                                                        
[gazebo:make] /usr/bin/make -f gazebo/gui/qtpropertybrowser/CMakeFiles/gzqtpropertybrowser.dir/build.make gazebo/gui/qtpropertybrowser/CMakeFiles/gzqtpropertybrowser.dir/build                                                         
[gazebo:make] In file included from <command-line>:0:0:                                                                                                                                                                                 
[gazebo:make] /usr/include/stdc-predef.h:59:1: warning: ./math_pch.hh.out.gch: not used because `NDEBUG' is defined [-Winvalid-pch]                                                                                                     
[gazebo:make]  #endif                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
[gazebo:make]  ^                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
[gazebo:make] /usr/include/stdc-predef.h:59:1: error: one or more PCH files were found, but they were invalid                                                                                                                           
[gazebo:make] /usr/include/stdc-predef.h:59:1: fatal error: math_pch.hh.out: Adresář nebo soubor neexistuje                                                                                                                             
[gazebo:make] compilation terminated. 
```

Thanks for help
content.html:
Is it supposed to work? I can't finish the build of Gazebo 8 in Release mode:

[gazebo:make] Building CXX object gazebo/math/CMakeFiles/gazebo_math.dir/Angle.cc.o                                                                                                                                                     
[gazebo:make] cd /home/peci1/tradr-git/drivers/gazebo7-ws/build/gazebo/gazebo/math && /usr/bin/c++   -DBUILDING_DLL -DBUILDING_DLL_GZ_MATH -DHAVE_OPENGL -DLIBBULLET_VERSION=2.82 -Dgazebo_math_EXPORTS -std=c++11  -Wall -Wextra -Wno-long-long -Wno-unused-value -Wfloat-equal -Wshadow -Wswitch-default -Wmissing-include-dirs -pedantic -fvisibility=hidden -fvisibility-inlines-hidden -std=c++11  -s -O3 -DNDEBUG -mssse3 -msse3 -mfpmath=sse -msse -msse2  -fPIC -I/home/peci1/tradr-git/drivers/gazebo7-ws/src/gazebo/test/gtest/include -I/home/peci1/tradr-git/drivers/gazebo7-ws/src/gazebo -I/home/peci1/tradr-git/drivers/gazebo7-ws/build/gazebo -isystem /home/peci1/tradr-git/drivers/gazebo7-ws/binary/include -I/usr/include/libusb-1.0 -isystem /home/peci1/tradr-git/drivers/gazebo7-ws/devel/include/ignition/msgs0 -isystem /home/peci1/tradr-git/drivers/gazebo7-ws/devel/include/ignition/math3 -I/home/peci1/tradr-git/drivers/gazebo7-ws/devel/include/ignition/transport3 -I/usr/include/uuid -isystem /usr/include/OGRE/RTShaderSystem -isystem /usr/include/OGRE -isystem /usr/include/OGRE/Terrain -isystem /usr/include/OGRE/Paging -isystem /home/peci1/tradr-git/drivers/gazebo7-ws/devel/include/sdformat-5.1    -fPIC -Winvalid-pch -include math_pch.hh.out -std=c++11 -o CMakeFiles/gazebo_math.dir/Angle.cc.o -c /home/peci1/tradr-git/drivers/gazebo7-ws/src/gazebo/gazebo/math/Angle.cc

[gazebo:make]  #endif
